trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>中的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an instance of this class through the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取此類別透過控制項的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The collection maintains a reference to the control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 集合會維護透過控制項的參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> includes shared and unshared rows.
trans-unit.target: 為了改善效能，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>包含共用和非共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set.
trans-unit.target: 共用的資料列共用記憶體來降低成本的大型記錄集。

trans-unit.source: If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的資料錄集非常大，您應該將共用的資料列盡可能小心。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 擁有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Adds one or more rows to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將一或多個資料列加入集合中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new row to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將新資料列加入集合。

trans-unit.source: The index of the new row.
trans-unit.target: 新資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Add> overload adds rows that are based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Add>多載加入為基礎的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The new row is shared, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 新的資料列會共用的話。

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property can be shared for best scalability.
trans-unit.target: 務必在指定的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>屬性可共用及最佳的延展性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: 加入新的資料列時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要排序新的資料列到正確的位置，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>排序資料列，在使用者修改資料格時的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new rows from being added:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項正在執行下列其中一個動作，暫時阻止加入新的資料列：

trans-unit.target: 選取控制項中的所有儲存格。

trans-unit.target: 清除選取。

trans-unit.target: 要加入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" /> 中的資料列數目。

trans-unit.target: 將指定數目的新資料列加入該集合。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last row that was added.
trans-unit.target: 已加入的最後一個資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Due to a bug, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddRange%2A> method will make your application stop responding if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property is `true` and the row for new records is selected.
trans-unit.target: 因為一個錯誤，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddRange%2A>方法可讓您的應用程式停止回應是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>屬性是`true`和新記錄的資料列已選取。

trans-unit.source: To work around this bug, you must cancel the selection of the row before calling this method, and then reselect the row.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決這個問題，您必須取消選取資料列之前呼叫這個方法，並再重新選取資料列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code example in this topic.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: Inserts one or more rows into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將一或多個資料列插入集合中。

trans-unit.source: The position at which to insert the rows.
trans-unit.target: 要插入資料列的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要插入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" /> 中的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified number of rows into the collection at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的資料列數插入在指定位置的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method adds rows that are based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法會加入為基礎的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The new row is shared, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 新的資料列會共用的話。

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property can be shared for best scalability.
trans-unit.target: 務必在指定的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>屬性可共用及最佳的延展性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: 加入新的資料列時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要排序新的資料列到正確的位置，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>排序資料列，在使用者修改資料格時的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小於零或大於集合中的資料列數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於 1。

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new rows from being added:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項正在執行下列其中一個動作，暫時阻止加入新的資料列：

trans-unit.source: Selecting all cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 選取控制項中的所有儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Clearing the selection.
trans-unit.target: 清除選取。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法正從下列其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件的處理常式進行呼叫：

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 屬性不是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> has no columns.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 沒有資料行。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="rowIndex" /> is equal to the number of rows in the collection and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 等於集合中的資料列數，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The row returned by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate" /> property has more cells than there are columns in the control.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate" /> 屬性傳回的資料列所具有的儲存格數多於控制項中的資料行。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This operation would insert a frozen row after unfrozen rows or an unfrozen row before frozen rows.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會在未凍結的資料列之後插入凍結的資料列，或是在凍結的資料列之前插入未凍結的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The position at which to insert the row.
trans-unit.target: 要插入資料列的位置。

trans-unit.source: A variable number of objects that populate the cells of the new row.
trans-unit.target: 填入新資料列儲存格的數目可變物件。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a row into the collection at the specified position, and populates the cells with the specified objects.
trans-unit.target: 將資料列插入集合中的指定位置，並將指定物件填入儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29> method adds an unshared row to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29>方法會將共用資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: 加入新的資料列時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要排序新的資料列到正確的位置，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>排序資料列，在使用者修改資料格時的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This operation would insert a frozen row after unfrozen rows or an unfrozen row before frozen rows.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow%29> method adds a shared row to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>, if possible.

trans-unit.target: 否則，新的資料列會取消。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A> method adds shared rows to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>, if possible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A>方法會將共用的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>如果可能。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the new rows are unshared.
trans-unit.target: 否則，新的資料列會取消共用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: 加入新的資料列時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要排序新的資料列到正確的位置，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>排序資料列，在使用者修改資料格時的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Due to a bug, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A> method will make your application stop responding if any rows with an index greater than `rowIndex` are selected.
trans-unit.target: 因為一個錯誤，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A>方法可讓您的應用程式停止回應是否與索引的任何資料列大於`rowIndex`已選取。

trans-unit.source: To work around this bug, you must cancel the selection of these rows before calling this method, and reselect the rows afterward.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決這個問題，您必須取消選取這些資料列之前呼叫這個方法，並重新選取資料列之後。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code example in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題的程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A> method to insert rows before selected rows to work around the bug indicated in the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A>方法插入的資料列之前選取的資料列，若要暫時解決 bug < 備註 > 一節所示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小於零或大於集合中的資料列數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> contains only one row, and the row it contains has more cells than there are columns in the control.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> 只包含一個資料列，該資料列比控制項中的資料行擁有更多的儲存格。

trans-unit.target: 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項正在執行下列其中一個動作，暫時阻止加入新的資料列：

trans-unit.target: 選取控制項中的所有儲存格。

trans-unit.target: 清除選取。

At least one entry in the <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> array is <see langword="null" />.

At least one row in the <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> array has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> property value that is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> 陣列中至少有一個資料列所具有的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> 屬性值不是 <see langword="null" />。

At least one row in the <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> array has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.

Two or more rows in the <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> array are identical.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> 陣列中的兩個或兩個以上的資料列相同。

trans-unit.source: -or-
At least one row in the <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> array contains one or more cells of a type that is incompatible with the type of the corresponding column in the control.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> 陣列中至少有一個資料列包含的一個或多個儲存格的型別，與控制項中對應的資料行型別不相容。

trans-unit.source: -or-
At least one row in the <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> array contains more cells than there are columns in the control.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridViewRows" /> 陣列中至少有一個資料列包含的儲存格比控制項中的資料行還多。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This operation would insert frozen rows after unfrozen rows or unfrozen rows before frozen rows.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會在未凍結的資料列之後插入凍結的資料列，或是在凍結的資料列之前插入未凍結的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.target: 取得指定索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.target: 指定索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: Accessing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> with this indexer causes the row to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: 存取具有此索引子的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 會讓資料列變成非共用。

trans-unit.source: To keep the row shared, use the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.SharedRow(System.Int32)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要維持資料列的共用狀態，請使用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.SharedRow(System.Int32)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 等於或大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Count" />。

trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.List%2A> unshares all the rows in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>, so you should avoid using this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.List%2A>會取消共用中的所有資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>，因此您應該避免使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.CollectionChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.target: 如果您修改共用的資料列，將會修改共用該資料列的所有資料列。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中以零起始的索引，複製作業從此處開始。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to an <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的索引開始，將集合的項目複製到 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.target: 相關聯 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項會繫結至具有兩者不是同時為 <see langword="true" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove" /> 屬性值的 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> from the collection at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中的指定位置上移除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero and greater than the number of rows in the collection minus one.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零且大於集合中的資料列數減一。

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new rows from being added:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項正在執行下列其中一個動作，暫時阻止加入新的資料列：

trans-unit.source: Selecting all cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 選取控制項中的所有儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Clearing the selection.
trans-unit.target: 清除選取。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法正從下列其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件的處理常式進行呼叫：

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="index" /> is equal to the number of rows in the collection and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 等於集合中的資料列數，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is bound to an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> implementation with <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove" /> and <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification" /> property values that are not both <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項會繫結至具有兩者不是同時為 <see langword="true" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove" /> 屬性值的 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification" /> 實作。
